overview: Pro Wrestling Fujiwara Gumi was a shoot style professional wrestling promotion based in Tokyo, Japan. This event was held on March 4th, 1991 at Korakuen Hall in Tokyo Japan and presented the following matches: Yusuke Fuke vs. Wellington Wilkins Jr., Yoshiaki Fujiwara vs. Johnny Barrett, Wayne (Ken) Shamrock vs. Minoru Suzuki & Masakatsu Funaki vs. Bart Vale.
title: PWFG: Hataage Daiissen
